DOC.brief_summary: This study examine effect pramlintide body weight safety tolerability obese subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Examine Effect Pramlintide Body Weight Its Safety Tolerability Obese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Is obese body mass index ( BMI ) > =30 kg/m^2 < =50 kg/m^2 , obese least one year screening . Usually consume least three major meal ( morning , midday , even ) day . Is currently enrol formal weightloss program . Has liposuction within 1 year screen plan liposuction study . Has receive investigational drug within 3 month screen . Has previously participate study use pramlintide .
